values:
Either you have stumbled upon this period in my life that I feel I must document for some reason or another or you were informed about this one way or another. Whichever way fits why you are reading this, i just wanted to tell you immediately that i'm going to kill myself on April 1st, 2006. That's not far away from now. I'm doing this for multiple reasons and there's nothing anyone can do or say to change my feelings about this. This day will be very eventful. A burial of a life and a celebration of another. My best friend of so many years, Debbie, will be celebrating her end to her final year of teen years. She will be 20. I'm so proud of all her achievements in such a short period of time. Actually, i'm just plainly proud of her. Without her, i wouldn't be who i am today. She gives me strength to deal with the day-to-day drama, she makes me feel safe when i'm afraid of whatever may happening in my life, she gives me all my range of emotions. This is why i chose that day. I feel she must be apart of my death.
          My name is Blake. I'm only 8 months younger than Debbie but honestly sometimes i feel i'm so much older. That's the way we are together. We can be confused for mature adults or ignorant children. Either way, we are always happy with eachother. I'm openly and undeniably homosexual. Debbie on the other hand is a little more confusing. One day she bitches about her guys and really craves the attention of almost any female that walks by and then other days she forgets that she ever had those feelings. I think this is why she feels a little misplaced in this world. She can't place herself. I still love her though and nothing will change that. To go off into a little wave of memories, I remember when she was "with" this girl. Ashes is what we called her. That name fit her well because she burned both Debbie and I. She was a wicked creature. Ashes was the kind of person that would just look at you and you felt you must give her the world without question and then she'd smack you down because it wasn't good enough. She knew how to play the world and how to destroy an innocent life without ever lifting a finger. She had so many peons working for her and sadly Debbie and I were too blinded by whatever she had to wake up and stop her. Now we've grown up and know to wear our sunscreen. 
          Recently, life's been kind of a game with us. If we have time we'll go out and try to party but most places refuse us and most people just don't like us together because we engorge eachothers attention as if we are friends that haven't seen eachother for years and years. Other than that, we live normal dramatic lives. Her parents haven't been together for years and her mother and step-father seperated not too long ago. Now her mother lives across the country and honestly there's not much hope of them seeing either one for quite a while. At times i think Deb is happy with this which is ironic because I live with my parents and sometimes wish they did live across country. Anyway, Deb lacking in a home moved in with her step-father who would rather look at pornographic material and make sexual comments or guestures to a 19 year old than attempt to get a female companion. This is why Deb is rarely at home. My excuse is a little different. 
         Like I said, i live at home with my parents. I have an older brother but no one really sees him much. He's kind of like me, either not home or locked up in his room playing video games or doing whatever he does with his friends. Not trying to make that sexual at all because he is straight and i haven't seen a female come into this house in a long time. I know this is turning into a gay thing but seriously, he isn't. Well, everyone but myself has a drug problem. It's not really a BAD problem, but it's horrible to me. They smoke weed like i smoke cigarettes. And personally, no one has room to complain or bitch  about it other than me, i live with them not by choice but by lack of resources to get the hell out of here. So, i'm rarely home because i hate how they act and i hate the smell of it. What i really hate most is when i'm going to leave i have to put on 10 pounds of perfume and sprays just so i don't smell like it. Ugh, what a waste of good perfume.
          I love Britney Spears.  She is my favorite pop star. I love her music, her style, her attitude, etc. Unlike most gays, i'm not really attracted to cher or madonna. I found someone so much better. Also, i'm a walking, talking, breathing discography. I have a huge list of bands, artists, songs, albums, and other information on the pop music industry in my head alone. This doesn't include what i've got on my computers, my cds, or written down somewhere. Go ahead, ask me anything about current pop industry and i can answer it. If i can't, i will money back guarentee find the answer within 24 hours. Ok so what if no one paid me to do it and if you didn't pay me then you get no money back if i'm wrong, it's the idea that counts right?
         My current love is actually one of my previous ones too. We've known eachother for about 2 years now. Whether or not we've been talking is the question. Well, just recently he came to visit me and we jumped back into the relationship blindly. I'm not shunning the idea what-so-ever. I just think we should have talked a little more. Anyway, i haven't heard his voice in about two days and it's driving me insane. I want to go see him so bad but he's at work i'm sure. I miss him so much. Oh, his name is Jeff. I forgot to inform you becuase when i get into part of my boyfriend and exboyfriends and exgirlfriends, it's going to get pretty confusing. Yes, i did say exgirlfriends, but that's another story.

I've felt many losses in my life time but none as painful as this. I lost something in my life that meant more to me than anything. I lost a part of my family. She wasn't a very big part, but she did play a big part in all our lives. It tears me apart just to write this, but i feel like it might help to tell her story. On December 7th, 2005 at 8:31 pm My dog, my pet, and my friend died. We all knew she wasn't going to make it; i just hoped she would have made just one more Christmas with us.

Ivana spent most of her life with us. I'm glad that we could make her happy. I don't even know how old she was. That doesn't matter now though. Now she is infinite, she has no age, and no pain. I miss her so much. The only thing i have to remember her is memories; we all know memories stay with us forever but fade away. I don't want her to fade away again. I had to watch it to begin with and i don't want to lose her.

I want her back. Death just isn't fair. YOu can't stop it, you can't control it, and you can't predict it. I hate it so much. I hate love. I wouldn't hurt so much if i didn't love. I guess i'm just mad at myself for letting this hurt so much. I'm trying so hard to not cry right now, but that seems to be all i can do. I can't sleep, barely eat, can't go anywhere. I'm too upset. I want my friend back. I didn't even get to say goodbye. I was gone the whole day and didn't even say goodbye. I'd be happier to know that knew i still loved her, and i was there for her. This is the best for her. She deserves to be at rest then suffering for my selfishness. I'm just sorry i didn't say goodbye.

Ivana Marie Trump, This is my goodbye. I Love You. I'm sorry....Goodbye.


Ivana Marie Trump
A great pet but a greater friend
Forever Missed
Miss. E.

I just need someone to listen to me while i rant about my life. I want people to understand that i'm not being a bitch for no reason. I just need someone to listen to me while i rant about my life. I want to release these feelings i'm trapping inside myself.
    My life seems to be falling apart and being put back together with superglue. You know what i mean, it's kinda like you want to make a vase you just broke water proof but the glue won't seal. Yeah, that's my life.
    The mother of mine happened to conviently had enough income and financing to buy herself a brand new 2005 Neon. You don't know how upset i am about this. I am the one who needs the new car. I'm still driving a broke down piece of shit 89 Civic. I can't even venture out to see the one friend that means more to me than dear life because of this car. You have no clue how much that is hurting me right now.
    I'm failing school because i can't survive the torment i put myself through. I'm failing school because i can't survive the torment other students put me through. I'm failing school because i can't survive the torment my father puts me through telling me i'm a failure, to give up, it's not work it, i'll never amount to anything but a diseased whore! That hurts
    I smoke more, concentrate less, and care about nothing now. I used to think that i should push myself to make fake smiles and wear them proud. That's too much work now.
   
    "Jenny was sweet, she always smiled for the people she meet"
   
    I just need someone to listen to me as I express my emotions. I just need...well, i just need debbie. She may only be about 30 minutes from me, but damn it right now she's on the moon. Kind of like, i can see her, but can't get at all close enough to her. I'm 18 years old, an adult and yet i'm still a child in many aspects. I still want someone to take care of me. I don't want to work my ass off to make ends meet. I want things to go right in my life. I want it to be like in 10th grade when every morning debbie would show up and wake me up. Out the door we went to school. Then we'd be together talking for about an hour before school. After school we would hang out again. It was great because there wasn't a moment that when i turned around with a tear in my eye she wasn't there holding a tissue.
    I just need someone to listen to me as I walk down memory lane. I'm terrified to walk alone because there are so many pot holes i'll trip on and hit the ground. I don't want to scrape my knee mommy. It makes it hurt and the red stuff comes out. I don't like boo-boos! I just want a band-aid. Do they make band-aids for the boo-boos you get when you are completely falling apart? Do they make band-aids for the boo-boos you get when you miss your best friend in the world, the one person who can look at you, smile and everything is ok again? Yeah, it's called a working car, gas, and money.
    I just wish i had someone to listen to me.
::insert update that was much needed here::

Since very few people read my livejournal...i don't really feel like going into a long huge update...so if you wanna know...call me 804-691-0397

Anyway, I've been at Mark's for about a weekish. Occasionally going home for a few more outfits and some cigarettes but other than that, i've been here. I've got to get a job so if you know any place that's hiring...TELL ME!!

Like i was saying, me and Mark have recently hooked up and we're both kinda iffy about the whole thing. Just to inform you'll, he has 8 "arrots".  he has 4 parrots and 4 ferretts. They are amusing. Well, debbie started smoking in hope to get us smokers to quit. I guess that's really sweet, kinda like one of those if you die i'll die situations but this is more like, if you smoke i'll smoke with you, that's how much i'm in love with you. hee hee.

So, his computer is really freaking slow...i miss cable modems. : (. And he uses AOL which is a big no no in the internet world because at any given moment just because you aren't pretty enough, they can kick you off line. Ok, so they dont' know what we look like but still.

OH....OH...by the way, sometime soon i will performing at a club called Wet in D.C. That should be fun...it's one of those clothing optional bars so yeah, you should come out and see me and help me win cause the winner gets money which i greatly need.

I'm also thinking about this website that basically is nothing but a live webcam porn site but the cool thing is that i choose who i do anything with.  well mark came home so i gotta pretend i wasn't doing anything...bye!!!

Just another day without sleep. Recently he's been getting worried about his sleeping habits. No matter what he does he can't sleep until about 5 am. He almost over-dosed on sleep aids one night and nothing happened, in fact he stayed up for 24 hours longer! It hasn't hurt him yet, other than the fact that he can't hang out with friends much becuase while they work, he sleeps.
    "Would you notice my scars if outlined them?" he says to himself.
CANCEL THE BOOK IDEA...IT TOOK TOO LONG

Starting now, i'm gonna type up a book i just finished reading... It is a little descriptive and more like a porn, but it's great! (if you like gay hustler life)

"While tanning in the nude on a San Francisco beach, ou intrepid hustler Phil Andros begins to hear curious messages from a longlost twin brother. Soon they lead him across America on a search for his doppelganger. His erotic encounters include a tongue-bath in the sand, a neat Latino in a Y shower, a helpful finger artist, an antigue Bishop M, a Chicago pimp, a liquor salesman with finesse, a loaded sophomore who's a fast learner, a tattooist S in a Manhattan leather bar, a fake cowboy who gets a surprise shower on an airplane, a hungry lad from Kansas, a butch cop in Oakland, and a final mysterious 69 back on China Beach.

    Thanks to the superb equipment and keen sense of humor with which he is generously endowed, Phil Andros' exciting adventures continuously fascinate and stimulate"

i will update every-so-often with a new chapter....if after the 3rd chapter, no one is commenting or reading, i will stop...have fun!!

Looking back at my life and watching the shit fly by just made things even worse. Watching people come and go and then getting to the present. Only a handful actually stuck around through the fuck ups, the shit, the drama, the changes. I owe my life to those few. Day by day i watch those few slowly drift in their own lives and away from mine. The razor coming closer and close to being used everyday but i force myself not to.

I got another speeding ticket a few days ago, trying to help juleah out and give her and her friends a ride to the beach. I had a miserable time. The sunrise was beautiful but that was the only thing that was good.
So now i'm worried about court. I've gotta go June 22, and the 23 and now July 15th. I"m so fucked.

Tomorrow is Monday, depending on how i feel, i might go out and look for a job. I gotta get one. Time for me to grow up. I'm not ready at all. Deb keeps telling me that my actions are usually immature, but when you get to know me and hear me talk, she says i'm more mature than most people. Ya know, i kinda do that purpose...I'm not ready to grow up at all, so i figure if act stupid and do dumb things, people won't expect me to grow up. They'll keep looking at me like i'm 16 and they have to rely on someone else.

I've been here too long waiting on someone to love me. No deb, i'm not talkin about you, i know you love me but that's just not what i need. I need someone to cuddle with, for them to hold me. I need to feel the warmth of thier body against mine as we stand in a line waiting for whatever. I don't want to hide who i am or who they are. I just want to be someone to someone else. I build everyone's egos and they're just like...ok. I want someone who's not just into my body. See Me For Me, Not My Body! Damn it, i just want someone!

Have to try
To break free
From the thoughts in my mind
Use the time that I have
I can say goodbye
Have to make it right

Have to find
'Cause I know in the end it's worth while
That the pain that I feel slowly fades away
IT WILL BE ALRIGHT
It Will Be Alright
it will be alright
it will be alright
it will be alright

I met deb's boyfriend today. He's alright. If he makes her happy, that's all that really matters. I can't really say much about him. Tomorrow we're supposed to contront ashes, if she's working. I've been sitting here debating on what i'm going to do with my life. So far, nothing. I need to grow up so bad but i'm just not ready to. I have to get a job, fix my car, move out, get a lover, pay bills, and i'm just not ready. I wanna be a kid still. I still want to live for free. I want to go out to the club every weekend and not have to worry about gas and getting in and food and drinks. I want to be able to drive anywhere i want and not have to worry about will i break down. I just don't want to worry anymore. I don't wanna worry about money, my friends, my family, myself, and anything else that crosses my path.
    I want to go out and have fun. I don't want to work all the time and come home to sit in my bed alone, watch tv, then sleep and repeat the next day. I wanna be able to sleep in late and do whatever. I'm tired of trying ot deal with everyone elses problems too.
    I'm tired of worrying about when i'm supposed to take juleah to get her learners, when i'm supposed to get a job, when my car's going to break down, when debbie's going to need my help to make her stop crying. I love my friends to death and it's hard on them being friends with me i know. Because one moment i just need time to myself but that same moment i want them around. I dont'  even know how to put that.
    There are few that i'll put life on the line to help them. Actually there's one. Debbie. She's my life. I'm scared of growing up for the most part that i might loose the most valuable things in my life. Because i'll be too tired or busy with work. I just can't handle this right now. Now isn't the time i need to drop out of school, have my car break down, have my parents steal my money, have drugs around me at all times, not be able to see debbie when i need her, have juleah need me to fix her god damned problems, to hear from ashes, to listen to jo-joe talk about absolutely nothing, to have to worry about whether or not i have to kicks his ass out of my house. I don't need all this now. I need Debbie to tell me to do. She has no idea though, and i know this. She can't help me. As much as i love her for trying but this is too much for her and myself to handle. I must force myself to do this on my own, i just hope she can be there to catch me because i know i'm going to fall.
    I've been smoking like crazy to pause the tension and stress of all this. I'm trying not to cut. I think i'll just pierce myself. Bye

Have you tried closing your eyes and trying to understand what someone means when they say "when the wind blows, the world has moved just that much more away from you". Yeah, i don't get it either. ::shrugs::
    I've been told all my life that i wasn't going to make it. I believed them. Then someone came to me and told me that i could make it, and i was strong, and not to worry, they were there. I believed them. It's funny how much i believe just from hearing things. Well, they lied to me, it wasn't ok, i didn't make it, i wasn't strong, i did worry, they weren't there. A little later someone also said the same thing, just in different forms. They showed me how i was going to make it, they proved to me that i was strong, they were really there.
    I guess it takes a while to understand that two people can say the same thing but one may truely mean it.
    Once again i was believing everything anyone would tell me, i stopped trusting myself. At this point, that person (my friend) leaves. Moves away, far away. There was barely any contact between us. I fell.
    I had no one there to keep me believing that i was fine. So, i stopped trusing everyone. I believed nothing anyone ever said to me because i was scared of being let down again. A long time passes and i grew cold as ice.
    One day, my friend came back. Home again to stay. I was so happy! i had missed my friend so much because they were back to help me. Friends to the end right? Well, the end is staying far from us now. Recently my friend has being trying to get their life straight just as i was. They are doing better than i am statistically but about equal emotionally. I get upset because my friend doesn't have time for me anymore. With work, and sleep, and doing what my friend needs to do, there just wasn't enough time for me. I understand this now, but then it was just unacceptable.
   

Lesson of my story. Always trust that if a friend does something to change your life completely, that they usually won't leave you until it's time. Don't get caught in jealousy because it always brings something so much worse than what you had expected. Always Always trust your friends, especially when they say they would give their life to you and not have a second though (and when they prove that they would).

Deb, ya know i love ya gurl! This was for you.

"How can you just leave me standing?
Alone in a world so cold.
Maybe I am just too demanding
Maybe I'm just like my father
Too bold
Maybe I'm just like my mother
She's never satisfied
(I can't get no satisfaction)
Why do we scream at eachother?
This is what it sounds like.."
When I cry.

those words come pouring out when i think of you. It seems like no one wants any thing to do with me. Everyone has their list of excuses. I make myself free for you and it seems like you want nothing. But when i'm too damn busy to even take care of myself is when you need help again. It's funny ya know. This seems to be where i can express how i feel about you and you have no idea. The entire time you read this you'll just think that it's about someone else.

I can't go on, you have no idea what you've done and you won't know, because i'm not going to tell you this time. Why should I? At times, i think being friends with ashes will better.

• The only way you know how i feel is by reading this. You don't know by my voice, or my face, or my actions. You just believe what you have to read because you won't talk to me anymore. What's with that? Did you find someone else to use like you used me? Do you not need me anymore? Did i show you how to fucking stand on your own two feet and now you can't even be here to help me on mine?

  • I'm so tired of feeling rejected from the world. i don't think you understand that by ignoring me it hurts me so much that i feel like i shouldn't be in this world to inconvenience you anymore. Why should you have to hide from someone right? Well, this is one less person you have to hide from, i'll inconvenience myself once again for you and hide myself, my life, my scars, my issues, my drama, my music, my movies, my bed, my room, my computer, my car, my pets, my money, my materials, just me.
  • for this i'd like you to know that you've become a scar on my body, i won't show you or tell you where it is, but i'd like you to know that it's there. just for you. only to prove to myself that this is how life is. you feel great and then you fall and there's a scar from the person you thought was holding you up. don't worry, it didn't hurt much. in fact, the pain from losing you hurt worse than the small razor slowly slicing at my flesh ripping it's way to a blood vessel to release the crimson blood out and drip down.
  • i'm ready for you to confront me about what i've done, and all i can tell you is that you weren't there to stop me like you promised. you weren't there to tell me that i'm going to be ok. you weren't there at all. even when i needed you the most, just like when i was there at every beckoning call for you to help you through your problems. you abandoned me. this isn't just to a specific person and you'll know who you are. my smiles will be fake and my mask on tight but i'll make sure there's a small part of me that doesnt hide it just to let you know. if you paid attention to me before you wouldn't need to search for it, you'd already know. but you didn't! no, you didn't. don't try telling yourself that it's not your fault because you are the one who made your choices and broke the promise you made me. that isn't anyone elses fault.
  • maybe it's my mind that makes me so corruptive and unforgiving. Or it's the fact that it's happened too many damn times and you knew all about it! you knew every damn thing there was to know about me but yet you still knew how to work me, play me, operate me like i was a little puppet for your show. guess what?
i cut my strings now!

Before you dare try to tell me how i should dress, talk, walk, act, drive, run, dance; you better understand who the hell you're talking to. Before you dare invade my space and try to redecorate my life, you better understand who the hell you're taking over. Before you dare try to be with me in my life as family, friend, associate, lover, enemy; you better understand that i'm gonna be ME! Fuck all of you who dared. I'm gonna live my life because i refuse to live yours. You live everyone elses lives becuase you can't even make your own. I mean damn, that's one sad bitch who has to take over someone elses life.
          I'm tired of being told who i'm gonna grow up to be. I'm tired of being told that i need to grow up. I'm tired of being told the bullshit that was told to them. I'm just plain tired, and sleep isn't helping this time. i mean shit! how many times do you have to ruin my life before you think i've had enough? how many times do you have to make me cry before you finally realize that it fucking hurts? how many times?
          Why can't i get what i really want without telling you? Why can't you just look into my fake blue eyes and understand that all i wanted was a fucking hug. Not a god damned ring, or diamond, or necklace, or bottle of wine, or any of that materialistic shit! I'm so damn sick of people thinking that i'm nothing but a money whore. Damn it, i didn't even want your money, i just wanted you to think i did so my shields don't have to come down for you. Why don't you just accept the fact that you can't get into my life with all the secrets revealed? Why can't you just accept the fact that i'll always hide something from you? Why?
          People every where wonder the answer to "why?" I gave up on wondering, i'm fucking gonna find out. Stay out of my way if you do some of the things listed above, other wise, follow close to make sure i don't fall.

Have you ever tried so hard to understand why things happen when they do? It's really wierd. Like with one good thing, something bad has to happen. Ashes called me just a few minutes ago..it was different to hear her voice again and actually be talking to her as if nothing happened. I guess in the back of my mind there's always gonna be that little memory of what happened. If she means good then i'm sorry because i just don't think that's gonna leave.
   I was looking at myself in the mirror today and realized...i don't look good in green! why has no one told me? ugh! So after i changed my shirt, i decided to post in here. I need to find out what i'm doing with school. Am i dropping out for the year and going back, am i gonna strive in just a few classes to pass them or what?! I told myself repetatively that i wasn't gonna fail and be a fuck up like everyone told me i would be. Well, damn it! i did.
   I stopped working with Bob mainly because it became more like i was with him instead of working. It just got too creepy for me. So here's what happened to trigger me.
   Sunday (the last day of spring break) i was supposed to go to the beach. Well,  i decided it was pointless to go, so i stayed home. I remember Bob telling me that Sunday would be the best day to go....so i was going to. 

anyway, i got distracted with food and forgot what i was saying...i'll finish it later

UPDATES:
1) i stopped working for Bob at the Crystal Wand and Candle Shop
2) i dunno if i said it already but Michael and I broke up after 3 weeks
3) Jeff and I are back together
4) That didn't last long...we broke up after 1 1/2 weeks
5) Basically dropping out of school..no point, i'm already failing
6) Ashes called me again

Ok, hi, nice to meet you!

Visions from the past will strike at any point it sees fit. You'll never know how much you missed out while you were sitting in your room doing drugs, or playing games. Sometimes it's best to just get out there and live it up!

Quick update:
1) jeff and i broke up
2) i'm dating michael clapp
3) jeff and adam are out to get michael and myself
4) i'll return the favor in a heartbeat and they better believe it!

I just got off the phone with debbie. She's gald i'm sticking up for myself finally. Yes, that's right...i'm taking up for myself!!!  ::shock shock:: :) So yeah, i'm sick of peoples bullshit and i'm not dealing with it anymore. They can all just rot in hell.

well shit...i had an idea for this entry but now i forgot...if the inspiration strikes i will be back...hee hee

watching the world pass me by as i sit on my porch swing just looking out wondering where i'm placed. I'm moving in slow motion while the world is speeding up. I like it here, i'm not ready to leave. i step out into this fast paced world un-prepared and i lose my balance and fall. I hit the ground hard and lose the idea of why i thought i was ready. I get back up and dust myself off and look around at those that were helping me get back on my feet. Thanks you guys. I closed my eyes and caught my breath and when i opened my eyes again, i realized i was alone.

Concentrating on the one thing that sets me free from this place (school) is the hardest thing to do. I'm not worried about school, i'm worried about finding myself within it. I walk the halls alone most of the time. too scared to actually make friends because they just end up hurting me more than ever. I'm not ready for this world

Work is the only place i feel i can escape to and relax and be understood. Sadly i don't speak. i just sit there listening to whatever my boss has to say, giving my opinion on occasion. that doesn't bother me. 

i'm losing myself everyday. i haven't cut in a while and i'm scared because i keep getting urges to do so. I'm trying to fight them off so i don't end up like someone i used to know. my life is getting so rough on me. i just need to get away...who ever reads this...i need to ask you a favor...take me to new york, and bring me back...i need to get up there. someone there understands me, and i need her. i thought i had a chance but i realized i don't anymore. i need her more than ever right now...she can just look at me and be able to fix everything. and i know she needs me, in some way, i can feel it. ok this is beginning to hurt...so i'm stopping...bye...

804-691-0397

Blake

I'm sitting in class wondering how long this day will be. I've tried being nice to Juleah, but i just can't be her taxi. I've hinted by telling her, "maybe you should stay the whole day at school" or "you should start looking for someone else to get you to work becuase i'm not gonna be able to if i get a job and i really need a job". It makes me wonder if she even cares that me being her taxi is driving me insane because i feel like i have no freedom.

I talked to andrea last night. We're probably going to go out again,  but in all reality, i doubt it. I just wish that for once someone can understand what goes through my mind while they are talking but then i'd be to scared to face them again.

I feel empty because i know i lost ashes, and there is nothing i can do to get her back. I'm guessing it's for the best. She's taught me a lot about myself, about life, about everything. I'll miss her...

Silence is the one thing i'm cherishing now...i wish it was around...my world is full of noise...and it won't go away.

for those of you who actually read my journal and get mad at me without leaving comments...guess what...i put it in here for a reason. I wanted you to find it. I just never wanted to tell you to your face, because i wasn't sitting through your bullshit telling me how horrible i am for thinking that. Well damn it, i....don't....care!

on the lighter side

a guy is visiting his wife in the hospital. She's going to die soon, the doctors said she has about 3 hours left. He sits down beside her and holds her hand...
He kisses her hand and she opens her eyes wide.
"darling, i must tell you something i've been hiding from you. I have to tell you before god takes me"
"what is it my love, you can tell me anything, i'll understand"
She shakes her head no, and proceeds to tell him...
darling, for the past 3 years i've been sleeping with other men behind your back"
"it's ok my love, i know"
"no you don't, it was your friends that i slept with"
"my love, it's ok...i knew the whole time..."
the woman looks confused for a moment but before having a chance to question it... he continues
"why do you think i went through so much trouble to poison your food?"

hee hee...it's funny...mean..but funny....::giggles:: Well i just wanted to put that up here so everyone can enjoy my stupidity....bye

Butterfly position with padding slid on carefully. Weight limit of about two hundred and fifty pounds. A soft, furry outside with a normal fabric inside. Red and black, with the silver frame. Oh so comfortable. Any position in my chair feels just right. Nothing can go wrong in my chair, unless i lean back too far and it folds up on me. Never tickled. I shouldn't do it. lol. A clean smell flowing from it everytime i sit down. As i enter the chair in whatever position may be pleasing me, i just sink in until the padding tenses and holds me in place. Oh, what a comfortable chair.
Well, as my second day at school passes by in a flash, i start to think about all the years i had before this and how this is my last year. I'm growing up. It scares me to death. Debbie and I have conversations about me growing up and how it's going to rip me apart because i won't have anyone around me anymore to listen to my emotional problems. I don't think she realizes that i already don't have anyone.
Soon i turn 18. I'm terrified because then i can't be the little kid that won't succeed. I'll have to succeed to survive. Now it's survival and no one is standing in my way again. But you seem to never resist. Especially when i talk to you about my parents. You just say "they are ass holes, you need to get out of there" and then you turn your back on me and worry about your problems again. Well damn it! It's my turn. I'm sorry you moved...even if you wanted it, i'm sorry you had to see matthew...even if you wouldn't leave afterward, i'm sorry you and laura are having problems...even if you still try to have a LD relationship knowing it never works.
This time, it's about ME! I'm stealing the spot light from everyone of you that i gave mine to. I'm taking it back, be prepared!

He looks into my hazel eyes and sees only the color that is deep within them. He'll never understand the emotions that are released on his computer screen as he reads my journal. Tears run down my cheeks as i read my own entries. I only think about what each of them truely means. If only everyone knew what i meant when i slid the razor down my arm in perfect cuts to spell out LOST. I am the lost child. I'll never be found. I dont' want to be found. I'm hiding from you because if you touch me you'll turn to shit. Everything i touch turns to shit. I have to repeat myself hoping that someone might catch on to what i'm trying to tell them. My wings are broken, and they can't be repaird by your simple words. You have to stop flying from me to carry me. If you want me, you have to come get me, sweep me off my feet and fly me to the heavens above. Show me happiness before you let me fall. It's a simple request. You know who you are. Just let me smile once before you break my jaw. Let me see clearly without the tears before you rip out my eyes. Let me be loved before you crush my heart again. Let me feel what you feel before you kill me. Please...i'm begging someone...just save me from my own cuts, my tears, my broken wings. I call to you... I'm admitting that i need your help. Don't turn your back on me now...Please...Please...please....

The scars on my wrist cut open from the razor. Sleep is the only cure. I sleep. Sleep. sleep...

Opening my eyes to see him in the morning is the greatest thing i could wake up to. Everyone tells me to get away before my heart breaks again. They don't understand that they only hurt me more. I want the pain. It comforts me. I don't know what it's like to live alone. I can't live alone. I have to be with someone, someone who actually knows i exist and says they care for me. Even if they don't, i still want to believe that they do. You say you care but do you ask what is wrong with me while i'm dripping blood off my finger tips. You just tell me not to do it, but you dont' question why i did it. Silly you! You'll never know because i won't let you. I'll let him know though, because i know he can help me. He makes me smile, laugh, he makes me HAPPY! You can't do that for me. And if you make me leave him then fuck you. because there will be a huge gap in my heart that not even you could fill.

Taking him away from me is like taking a child's imagination away and telling them they have to live in this real fucked up world. To live in depression, never knowing what creativity they could come up with if they had thier imagination. You telling me to leave him is like taking my imagination, my dreams, my heart away and holding in your hand as if it was yours! FUCK THAT SHIT! It is mine. You can't claim it as your own. How dare you think you know what is better for me. How dare you! Don't talk to me. Don't touch me thinking that your touch will heal my wounds that i'm inflicting on my self and you telling me that i'm wrong. I"M RIGHT! I know what i want! You don't! How can you tell me what is good for me? You don't even know what's good for yourself! HYPOCRITE!

I'm loosing who i used to be because i started to follow your footsteps down the sandy beech. I didn't realize that i was walking alone...

Can you honostly say that if i need you, i can have you? Can you say that if i'm dying you'll hold me and comfort me until i let go of my soul and let my heart be free? Can you say that you want what's best for me? No! you can't. you can't love me, i can't have you. You can't say you'll hold me because you won't let me let go! You can't say that you would give me what's best for me because you're taking the one thing i want away from me and expecting me to find it in you. You don't have what i want, nor will you ever. What i want it so be loved. Can you love me? I don't think you can. I dont think you even know what love is. You're just blinded by the good looks and sweet personality that i'm throwing out at you. Do you see the black heart inside? Do you see the blood dripping off my cuts? Do you hear my screams for help? Do you really think you know me? You only know what i tell you, but i tell you only lies. I'm sorry Debbie. I do love you, but everytime i told you i was fine, i wasn't. I wasn't. I'm sorry Ashes. Everytime you saw a smile break through my tears it was fake. So fake. I'm sorry Brandon. I got hooked on something i thought i could have. I realized now that, it was hurting me more than anything. I'm so sorry i became addicted to you. I'm truely sorry. I'm sorry everyone. I hid the truth from you. I hid what i was from you. I couldn't stand to watch people mourne over me when i'm the one who needs comforting. I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry...

no more tears...
no more tears...
no more cuts...
no more cuts...
no more cuts...
no more pain...
no more pain...

A tombstone place kindly in a dark cemetary. The letters faded from time. The long left tears have now sank into the earth and rested on the coffin. The roses have decomposed, and the coffin is just fine. The parties that raged on in this town above this body. 

"here lies the hated, the unloved, Blake"

Some say that they would miss me. Lies. Some say they would never leave my side but now they have everything they ever wanted. Everything i stopped them from getting because i was too jealous that they could succeed before me. The rain acts as a symbol for everytime i cried for love. I guess this is why it hasn't stopped raining...

I'm not suicidal people. I'm just lost as to what i thought i could do to succeed in life. Now i know, the best thing for me is to live in this pain. This unloving world where no one can understand what i'm screaming out to them. I hear everything, even thier whispers... but do you hear me screaming at the top of my lungs what is wrong with me. You claim you do, but i know that when you try to tell me, you have no clue. Will you ever open your mind long enough to listen to what i have to say, to what i feel, to why i hate you so much? You're so blinded by the truth that all you can see is what you want to believe. I see everything. I was smart. I brought sunglasses!!!

It lingers in my mouth for just a few seconds. Long enough to get the citrus taste in my mouth. I swallow it down like i do my emotions. It slightly chokes me. Too many thoughts race through my head as i cough and disperse this liquid on the floor. It disgusts me. I clean up the mess with the same towel i had used to wipe up the blood from earlier that evening. Lost was back in my arm again. I had missed it. The cuts deeper, darker, worse this time only to make it more noticable to people that still haven't caught on to the fact that i don't want them in my life any longer. I want to be lost, to live in my purgatory, to be in so much pain that if i survive then i know, no one can take over my life again. I would have grown truely cold hearted. You still approach me, and i push you back with all my strength making it harder for you to take another step forward. If i give up, i fall into the pit of nothingness. I will fight to the death to not fall. I will climb back up and win. You can't hold me down like you did last time. This time, i'm going to beat you to the top and you're going to know what it's like to suffer at the bottom, where no one cares for you, no one helps you, no one knows you. I open my eyes from blinking to realize that i'm still in the world, on this continent, in this state, in this town, in this house, in this room, on this chair. I grab my cigarettes and light one. Inhaling the death that feels so good. I release what little bit of anger in the smoke that trails out of my lungs and into the air. I turn around and there you are, sitting there, wondering why i wasn't responding to your questions. I get up and walk away, go outside, and drive away. I'm driving so fast the wheel is hard to control. The car is driving it's self now. I'm sitting watching my death come toward my face in the form a two bright lights. The crash, the screams, the pain, the darkness.

"I love you, i want you, i need you" That's all he said that night. It was a lie. He didn't want me. He didn't need me. He didn't love me. What the fuck? He hurt me so bad. He walks away from me everytime, leaving me believing he loves me. I fall for him everytime, believing he loves me. I pull myself out of the hole and search someone to fill the gap in my heart. No one is big enough.
   I can't stand it when you say you still care for me. It's still a lie. Everything is a lie. Don't get any closer because i'm about to snap and when i do, guess where it's going. That's right, toward you...
   Turning my back and running is the only way to get away from everything you are. I'm running for myself, not from you. I'm saving my life instead of taking it. I'm getting away from everything and anything you are. I can't stand to be around you anymore. I want to leave so damn bad it's killing me. Let me go!
   I still see you in my mind,
   I wish that I could have more time,
   I now that it will be just fine,
   All is well now, no need to cry,
   No need to cry...
   No need to cry...
   No need to cry...
   No need to cry...

He walks alone in the pouring rain. Feeling every drop that fell down his cheek. It wasn't rain, it was tears. He has no where to go, no one to hold, no one to comfort him when he needed it the most. He arrives home, no one there to greet him. Off to his room. He sits in the dark and strips off his clothes. The crimson red blood drips off him like the rain had done just five minutes before. His cuts are deep and meaningfull. Lost. In the hands of one is his life, his heart, he soul. It's being crushed. The parading light from his lighter flows through the room like energy being released. The cigarette burns with a slight crackle. Translucent smoke then is exhaled through his mouth and dispersed into the air, contaminating the room. He sits down, staring into the darkness wondering why there is no light, no one else there, nothing. An empty room. He lays down, exhaling smoke, and feeling the water from his water bed surround his body. Crushing the cigarette making the smoke thin slowly. His eyes close and lets his subconcious mind take over, where all his dreams, his hopes, his life exists. He is now....asleep.

Just one step further without commitment. It does not make sense to me. The confusion that runs through my head every time I think about him. What does he want from me? I'm not sad, nor will I be. I have given that up. I just want to see where it is going. Is it all just for sex? Does he want more? People say there is only one way to find that out, but I don't like to deceived. I have to know what he is thinking when he is over and we cuddle. When he rolls on top of me and lays there. When he holds me. Is it because he is lonely and just needs someone there? Is he scared of dating someone because then he would have a slight obligation? I feel so lost. We can't speak about our emotions. It just does not come out right. I try to tell him everything but he tells me nothing. I wish he would open up to me. Only at night does he come over. What does he do all day? What is he hiding from me? Who are these people he speak about? Why can't I know?

I can understand how work and social life can get in the way of the day time. But there are times when we have nothing to do and he just does not want to see me. Why is this? The word why troubles me so horribly. I wish they could be answered. It's Saturday afternoon and not a word from him. Do the words I love you choke him? They don't choke me. I'm not scared to say it. I say what I feel, maybe that's the problem. I am scared of finding out the truth though. I do not want to hear something that I was not expecting. I scares me to know that maybe he just does not like me. It would confuse me even more. Especially after all that we have done together. Like I said, one step further and still without commitment.

As sad as it is, i can no longer post my book on my web-page. I discovered that someone has taken it, and claimed it as their own. I'm not happy about that. But, if they want to try to copy it...let them, they don't have the rest of the story. Anyway. Work has taken over my life completely. Well, at least for right now it has. lol. I've been working way too much. Thank god i don't have to work anymore after monday. I happy. I'm still trying to think of a way to ask brandon out before the 14th of even on. I just can't think of a way i can get it out of him without him saying *avoids question*. I think he likes someone else but doesn't want to hurt me by telling me. I personally think that it hurts more not knowing then anything. I'm guessing things should work out to be the best. They say that if you want something, to let it go, if it comes back, it's meant to be yours.
          I think we should take one candle, light it, and just watch it burn all the way down. You then will understand the flame. Why it dances and flickers at the slightest movement in the room. It's weak and it needs the wax to keep it steady and strong. Humanity is the things that cause the world to flicker. We are just stumbling on the earth looking for a reason of why we are here. It's sad. When we discover the reason, we are so thrilled, we die. Only to bring another soul into the world to do the same thing.
          That is all i have to say for the night. Except one thing...Remember that when you are done reading this, and if you decide to respond or just close out the page, always remember to be true to yourself. Be true in whatever you do. Don't do something someone else wants you to do just because it's right. Do what YOU feel is right, because wouldn't it be better to do what you want and fail instead of doing what they want and succeeding?

He couldn't understand the concept of it. The pain, the tears, the heartbreaks. What was the good in it? Still, he wanted, he craved, he needed it. Teases are thrown at him from the people he confesses to. So he learned not to speak, not to show, not to ever reveal what is hiding under his dark clothes, his bad attitude, his tears. He walks alone, terrified of what will happen next. Depression isn't a thing to him. It goes so much more deeper than that. Friends, family, acquaintances put him down, making him feel worse. Drugs were an escape from all this, that didn't last long. Sex wasn't his scene. The only sex he can remember was rape. The pain, the abuse, the emotions, the screaming, the tears, the trauma!! Nothing was spoken from this. Fear! That's all he felt. That's all he could feel. Emotions couldn't break down his gates anymore, they couldn't get inside of him, they weren't there. So he walks, alone, unless with people like him. The people that follow in his footsteps aren't even close to being as fucked up as he was...is! Still he walked away, not understanding why they would want to be there for him, to help him, to be his "friends". He pushes, runs, shoves, and hurts so many people just so he can be alone. Corners were his friends. Dark corners where no one could see him. He liked being invisible to the world he didn't belong to. He has nothing that he can call his own. Nothing but the pain, the anguish, the fear, the tears...that's all. He has no materials. He isn't a material boy. All he wants is someone to love him, the way he loves them. When will that come?

::End Chapter 1::

He sits, he watches, he imagines, he goes through complete destruction. He never pictured the world as a place he belonged. Absence through time. Destruction through emotions. Laughter didn't exist to him. Neither did love. One of his more personal things. Love just wasn't an option for him, he craved it. Craving that of a boy. Only one could give him what he needed. That boy didn't know. Didn't know the damage he cause when he said no. Didn't know why tears of blood ran cold down his cheeks. Didn't have a clue. Still, love wasn't an option for him. ::Ashes walks in::

Finishing details later....

i'm on a roll today, this is my second update in the same month...what will we do. The world must be coming to an end. LOL. Anyway, let's update you. I'm still after Brandon, yeah, i know, it's pitiful. But still, i mean, you can't control who you like. He isn't a bad person in any way. Right now i'm at Crystal's house, without crystal...And everyone is asleep...so i'm scared to play music becuase i like to hear it loud. Oh well. Have you ever looked into the mirror and not recognized yourself, not because of make-up, or a new hair cut, but really didn't see yourself in it? Doesn't it send cold chills all the way down your spine? Like you don't exist. I feel that everytime, which is why i'm scared of pictures and mirrors, or anything that shows your true self. People hide themselves inside their make-up, piercings, and hair styles. In doing this, you never get to know your true self. I guess I'll never know myself very well. But i do know this. Be all that you want to be, becuase when you think about it, you only have this one life to live. so live it up...and live it well. In doing this, you never need to know who you are...you just remember who you want to be. Be fake, it's the only way to be safe.

On better news.... everday i'm one step closer to getting the one thing i really want....if you know what it is...don't ask...if not...then ha ha ha...you won't know until i'll tell you. So i hope you're someone special. Specialty is so over rated these days.  Specialty can be anything. A rock can be special because it got stuck in your shoe and followed you to the person that you now are in love with. And when you find that rock, you hold it and think "wow, this must be lucky to me because it was the thing that made me trip on my new b/f-g/f. It is so special to me, i'll keep it forever" People do this all the time, isn't that odd. That people can do just about anything and make it seem right becuase  that's how we work. We see something and think something else completely opposite. Why do we do this... are we scared of something we don't need to know, are we just that clueless? We'll never know. I guess in a way we are clueless....becuase we can't know if we are...or are we?

~*Blake*~
